item.title: Abandoned white van with alarm sounding, 31st January
item.description:
White van left in Nathaniel Court with constant alarm sounding all evening and night. Alarm can be heard throughout the neighbourhood, along Green Lanes & Coster Avenue.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Green Lanes, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Poor street lighting, 30th January
item.description:
When i come home and walk on hawstead and Medusa road se6, usually there is no street lighting and it is pitch black. I have an injured toe & a few times I have become very scared, uneasy and almost panicked as you cant even see where you are walking. It’s very scary. Please make the road visible again as it’s obvious they are being turned off. I have mentioned this on a number of forums and responses are being noted. If anything happens I will definitely take things further.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 13, Morena Street, Ladywell, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large pothole on middle of road, 30th January
